author: centic
msg: Bug 55723: Make HSSFSheet.setAutoFilter() behave equal to XSSF, also make XSSF work when setAutoFilter is called multiple times

author: jleroux
msg: Completes "Set field in (at least) widget screen does not take into account a locale for (at least) the Float type" https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-5453 for minilang.
Locale applies only when the type is also passed, like in widgets.
